name: Sheila X
description: I am very simple and easy going, that love to sing with the real desires. I am open-minded and full of passion. I am honest and always want to be faithfully to my man, the happiness of my man means a lot to me and always want to see him happy. I wake up every day and enjoy each day of my life! I smile to simple things, and try to be positive. This is not easy to be happy when you are lonely, that is why I made the decision to join this dating site when a friend told me about it, just to see if i can get my dream man out from here as she did got her own and now living in a happy home with him. The ideal picture for me is the one when we are cooking breakfast together, looking still a bit sleepy after a night that is real happiness, when you are smiling with the beloved man and feel the happy day is still ahead!. I am ready to give all my care, love, attention, devotion to the man I will respect and love forever. I’m looking for my life partner, I need an loving and stable man to love and be loved.
